thread.title: Florida Panthers vs. New York Rangers odds, tips and betting trends
thread.title_full: Florida Panthers vs. New York Rangers odds, tips and betting trends

author: DataSkrive
title: Florida Panthers vs. New York Rangers odds, tips and betting trends
text:
The No. 3 team in the Eastern Conference, the Florida Panthers (20-12-2), host the conference’s top squad, the New York Rangers (24-8-1), on Friday, December 29 at 7:00 PM ET at Amerant Bank Arena. The game airs on ESPN+, MSG 2, and BSFL.
Florida secured a 3-2 victory on the road its last time out on December 27 against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
In its most recent game on December 27, New York earned a 5-1 home victory over the Washington Capitals.
Ahead of this matchup, here is what you need to get ready for Friday’s hockey action.
Stream NHL games and originals all season long on ESPN+! Florida Panthers vs. New York Rangers Odds and Betting Lines Favorite: Panthers (-125) Underdog: Rangers (+105) Over/under: 6 Panthers Stats and Trends Florida has won 16 of its 24 games as a favorite this season. In 21 games with shorter than -125 moneyline odds this season, the Panthers have won 13. The moneyline odds imply that Florida has a 55.6% chance of winning this contest. Florida and its opponent have gone over the current 6-goal total in 16 of 34 matches (47.1%) so far this season. In the last 10 contests, the Panthers are 6-4-0 (80.0% of possible points). They have totaled 27 goals over that stretch. Defensively, the Panthers have given up 24 goals (2.4 per game) in those 10 matchups. Rangers Stats and Trends The Rangers have been an underdog in six games this season, with four upset wins (66.7%). New York has played with moneyline odds of +105 or longer once this season and lost that game. The Rangers have a 48.8% chance to win this game (implied from the moneyline). New York’s games have gone over 6 goals in 19 of 33 chances this season. In the past 10 games, the Rangers have claimed 80.0% of the possible points with a 6-4-0 record. They have averaged 3.3 goals per game (33 total) over that span. On the defensive end, the Rangers have given up 28 goals (2.8 per game) in those 10 outings. Panthers vs. Rangers Game Info and Start Time Game Day: Friday, December 29, 2023 Game Time: 7:00 PM ET TV Channel: Bally Sports Live Stream: Fubo ( Watch for free ) Watch the NHL on Fubo!
